item.title: Telegram with Bitcoin integrated by StartChat Tech
item.description:
Telegram with Bitcoin integrated by StartChat Tech

StartChat combines the backend encryption of Telegram with the convenience of 2-click Bitcoin transactions and wallet currencies conversions display such as $USD, EURO, GBP, Ruble, Yen. Apple Touch ID and Pin Code as security feature. No wallet info needed to send bitcoin transactions to contacts. Its user-friendly and automated, just like sending a picture.

item.title: Colony Will Have Its Own Non-Profit Foundation
item.description:
Colony Will Have Its Own Non-Profit Foundation

In an extensive blog post, Jack du Rose, Founder of Colony, announced the creation of the non-profit Colony Foundation, which will develop the open source Colony smart contract network on Ethereum.

item.title: The price of bitcoin just surged to a 20-month high
item.description:
The price of bitcoin just surged to a 20-month high

Bitcoin is having a great weekend. Since Friday morning, the price of bitcoin has increased 15% and briefly reached $530. That's the cryptocurrency's highest price since August 2014, when bitcoin traded around $532. The market value of all bitcoin in circulation crossed $8 billion. There are different theories about what's driving the increase.

item.title: ShapeShift Adds DGD and DAO Support
item.description:
ShapeShift Adds DGD and DAO Support

ShapeShift, the crypto-to-crypto digital currency exchange has announced the inclusion of two new crypto-assets on the platform. Users can now trade DGD and DAO on the platform. ShapeShift, the cryptocurrency exchange today announced that it is supporting DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) and DGD (Digix DAO) tokens on its platform.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Advances Above $500
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Advances Above $500

Bitcoin price continued advancing strongly and cleared $500 with minimal effort yesterday. Sunday trade has been mostly corrective, but there is no strong sign that the advance is over. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member?

item.title: Google Just Murdered 99Satoshis...(Bitcoin Faucet Update)
item.description:
Google Just Murdered 99Satoshis...(Bitcoin Faucet Update)

Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ Share on LinkedIn+It is with a sad heart that I declare the premature death of 99Satoshis who was only 2 weeks old. 99Satoshis died from a Google Adsense ban on May 13th 2016. May he rest in peace...

item.title: New sgminer fork With X11 Evo Algorithm Support
item.description:
New sgminer fork With X11 Evo Algorithm Support

There is now an sgminer fork for GPU mining Revolvercoin (XRE) that uses a new X11 Evo algorithm ( source) for AMD GPUs. The new X11 Evo algorithm comes as a solution to the already available ASIC miners for the standard X11 algorithm, meaning that X11 Evo is only CPU and GPU mineable for the moment, though CPU mining with a GPU miner available is not very reasonable.

item.title: London Workshop Explores Benefits and Challenges of Blockchain for Identity - CoinDesk
item.description:
London Workshop Explores Benefits and Challenges of Blockchain for Identity - CoinDesk

The Identity & KYC conference in London hosted a workshop on using blockchain technology to improve know-your-customer processes earlier this week. Led by blockchain compliance consultant Si√¢n Jones, the workshop was attended by a group drawn from banks, financial institutions, startups and regulators.

item.title: BitLicense Has Done More Good Than Bad to the Bitcoin Sector - NEWSBTC
item.description:
BitLicense Has Done More Good Than Bad to the Bitcoin Sector - NEWSBTC

BitLicense, introduced in the New York state did more harm than good to the digital currency technology industry. Other governments intend to avoid making the same mistakes. Read more... When BitLicense was introduced, it was hailed as a defining moment, where the government-less and regulation-less cryptocurrency platforms meet regulatory machinery set up by governments and centralized organizations.

item.title: How do I set up a news publication on Ethereum?
item.description:
How do I set up a news publication on Ethereum?

I was thinking of creating a news outlet and was wondering if anyone knew how to set up a website on Ethereum. I hear it'd be a smart place to set up a publication but I have no clue how to code.
